title: HOUR 3 - Eric Mangini
itunes:title: HOUR 3 - Eric Mangini
description:
Eric Mangini joins to talk the influence John Madden had on his life growing up, while also giving Colin a little push back on the Rams winning the Matt Stafford trade.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
